revision.text: ==English== ===Etymology=== {{confix|en|xeno|philous}} ===Adjective=== {{en-adj}} # [[xenophilic]]; loving what is [[foreign]] #* '''2002''', Peter Schwab, ''Africa: A Continent Self-Destructs'' (page 33) #*: In September 2000 General Guei, who had inflamed the anti-northern atmosphere by attacking believers in democracy as '''xenophilous''', escaped an assassination attempt.
